description:
api: add FreeBSD to go1 API

Now that gri has made go/parser 15% faster, I offer this
change to slow back down cmd/api ~proportionately, adding
FreeBSD to the go1-checked set of platforms.

Really we should have done this earlier. This will prevent us
from breaking FreeBSD compatibility accidentally in the
future.

messages.text:
*** Submitted as http://code.google.com/p/go/source/detail?r=d8e47164f8dd ***

api: add FreeBSD to go1 API

Now that gri has made go/parser 15% faster, I offer this
change to slow back down cmd/api ~proportionately, adding
FreeBSD to the go1-checked set of platforms.

Really we should have done this earlier. This will prevent us
from breaking FreeBSD compatibility accidentally in the
future.

R=golang-dev, r
CC=golang-dev
http://codereview.appspot.com/6279044

Hello golang-dev@googlegroups.com,

I'd like you to review this change to
https://go.googlecode.com/hg/

On Sat, Jun 2, 2012 at 9:42 AM, <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:

> api: add FreeBSD to go1 API
>
Linux/ARM is also officially supported by Go 1, should we also test for it?

Yes.
On Jun 2, 2012 4:34 PM, "minux" <minux.ma@gmail.com> wrote:

>
> On Sat, Jun 2, 2012 at 9:42 AM, <bradfitz@golang.org> wrote:
>
>> api: add FreeBSD to go1 API
>>
> Linux/ARM is also officially supported by Go 1, should we also test for it?
>

subject: code review 6279044: api: add FreeBSD to go1 API
